text: uliui junim-eun ojig hananim ppun-ilago malhan geos hanalo budangha ge gohyang-eulobuteo chubangdanghan ideul-i issnola man-il hananim-ui bohoga eobs-eossdeolamyeon bulsinjadeul-i jibaehan su dowondo gyohoedeuldo yudaegyo hoedang deuldo hananim-eul yeom-wonhaneun sawondeul do pagoedoeeoss-eul geos-ila sillo hana nim-eun geubun-ui jong-gyoe gat-i haneun ja leul seunglihage hasini hananim-eun gang hasimgwa neunglyeog-eulo chungmanhasim-ila
